xmlconfig.query: select 'demo' as c_AccountName, 'Test service' as c_Description, id_enum_data as c_Units, %%%SYSTEMDATE%%% as c_Time from t_enum_data where id_enum_data >= 10 and id_enum_data < (10 + %%SUCCESS_COUNT%%) union all select 'demoxx' as c_AccountName, 'Test service' as c_Description, id_enum_data as c_Units, %%%SYSTEMDATE%%% as c_Time from t_enum_data where id_enum_data >= 10 and id_enum_data < (10 + %%ERROR_COUNT%%)
